Description: ERP Technical Consultant - MS Dynamics AXSolution Design: Collaborate with functional consultants and business stakeholders to understand business requirements and design technical solutions using MS Dynamics AX.Customization and Development: Customize MS Dynamics AX applications through extensions, modifications, and integrations using X++ programming language and other development tools.Data Migration: Perform data migration and integration tasks to ensure seamless data flow between MS Dynamics AX and other systems.Technical Documentation: Create detailed technical documentation, including technical design specifications, data models, and test plans.System Configuration: Configure MS Dynamics AX modules and functionalities based on business requirements and best practices.System Testing: Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing to validate the functionality and performance of developed solutions.Troubleshooting and Support: Investigate and resolve technical issues and provide post-implementation support to end-users.  Skills
Skills: For MS Dynamics AX 2012 R3 Technical Consultants the below experiences are expected
* AX 2012 R3 ERP Technical resource to perform technical development tasks in AX 2012 R3 ERP modules
* Minimum 6+ years of Technical experience in AX 2012 R3 ERP modules
* Responsible for defining Technical solutions design for the systems and applications in scope

* Providing technical support to the escalated support issues/incidents For AX 2012 R3 ERP Technical Consultants, resource should be having hands on experience in - Interfaces - AX 2012 R3 Reports & BI - AX 2012 R3 Workflows - AX 2012 R3 Applications Framework - Form Personalization - AX 2012 R3 AOT components.
